Airi Kanna

Korean: 아이리 칸나

Group (2024):
Mystic until Dec 2, 2024

Introduction

Airi Kana is a South Korean V-Tuber and singer. She is a former member of the VTuber groups StelLive and YumePercent. Originally debuting as a soloist in May, 2023, with the single "ADDICT!ON", she later debuted in StelLive on February 21, 2024, as part of the subunit, 1st Generation 'Mystic'.

Her birth year is unknown, but the date is known to be December 2.
